column3: Do you request blood donations on social media (e.g., Telegram, Discord, etc.)?

column11: What challenges do you face in connecting with blood donors? How can these be overcome?
column12: What improvements would you suggest to make BNet  more widespread among blood donation seekers?

column11: Normally the request is not sent to the proper place sometimes, and other times it is not well circulated. A large pool of donors can help to overcome this scenerio.

column10: Not applicable (I have never used any such app before)

column12: make the commands easier and try to incorporate in other social media apps
